data_attributes.name: Horses per race
data_attributes.description: Total number of horses participating in a race.

data_attributes.name: Last Traded price
data_attributes.description: The most recent price at which a bet was matched on a horse.

data_attributes.name: Current lay price
data_attributes.description: The current price available for laying a bet on a horse.

data_attributes.name: Current back price
data_attributes.description: The current price available for backing a horse.

data_attributes.name: Last total odds
data_attributes.description: The last recorded total odds for a horse. 1.0 means 100%

data_attributes.name: Back total odds
data_attributes.description: The total odds for backing all horses in a race. 1.0 means 100%

data_attributes.name: Lay total odds
data_attributes.description: The total odds for laying all horses in a race. 1.0 means 100%

data_attributes.name: Back momentum
data_attributes.description: Trend or movement in the back prices of a horse. Example values can see in the momentum tables.

data_attributes.name: Lay momentum
data_attributes.description: Trend or movement in the lay prices of a horse. Example values can see in the momentum tables.

data_attributes.name: Last trade momentum
data_attributes.description: Trend in the last traded price. Example values can see in the momentum tables.

data_attributes.name: Avg $
data_attributes.description: Average amount of money wagered.

data_attributes.name: Bar
data_attributes.description: The barrier number or gate position from where a horse starts the race.

data_attributes.name: Career
data_attributes.description: The total number of races a horse has participated in.

data_attributes.name: Last 10
data_attributes.description: Performance record of the horse in its last 10 races.

data_attributes.name: Number
data_attributes.description: The saddlecloth number assigned to the horse.

data_attributes.name: Odds
data_attributes.description: The betting odds for the horse.

data_attributes.name: P%
data_attributes.description: The percentage probability of the horse winning according to betting odds in percentage.

data_attributes.name: Rtg
data_attributes.description: Rating assigned to a horse based on its performance.

data_attributes.name: W%
data_attributes.description: Win percentage of the horse in its career. Values are in percentage

data_attributes.name: Wgt
data_attributes.description: Weight carried by the horse in a race, including the jockey and gear. Values are in kg.

data_attributes.name: Age
data_attributes.description: Age of the horse. Typically ranges from 3 to 10 years for racing horses.

data_attributes.name: Apprentice
data_attributes.description: Indicates if the jockey is an apprentice. Affects weight allowances.

data_attributes.name: Average Prize Money
data_attributes.description: Average prize money earned per race.

data_attributes.name: Barrier
data_attributes.description: The starting gate position for the horse in a race.

data_attributes.name: Best Fixed Odds
data_attributes.description: The best fixed odds available for the horse.

data_attributes.name: BetEasy Odds
data_attributes.description: Odds offered by the BetEasy bookmaker.
